org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.methods

Class HorizontalImpactBalancing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.methods.BalancingMethod
      • org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.methods.HorizontalImpactBalancing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HorizontalDistanceBalancing

    public class HorizontalImpactBalancing
extends BalancingMethod
    HorizontalImpactBalancing is a method that merges tasks that have similar impact factors.
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
